scripts.build: yarn tsc --outDir output/build/ && yarn tsc --outdir output/build/commands commands/*.ts && yarn tsc --outdir output/build/components/ components/*.ts
scripts.dev: yarn tsc --outDir output/dev/ && yarn tsc --outdir output/dev/commands commands/*.ts &&  yarn tsc --outdir output/dev/components/ components/*.ts && node output/dev/index.js
